title: Production go-live documentation completion (deployment, domain setup, and runbook)

requirements.summary: Make production deployment process verifiable and loggable for publishing Draft Version 33 to IC mainnet (documentation + log capture).
acceptanceCriteria: Backend and frontend canisters are deployed to the IC network using `dfx build ... --network ic` and `dfx deploy ... --network ic` as per `frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOY_CHECKLIST.md`.
Verification is completed for both the direct canister URL (`https://<canister-id>.ic0.app`) and the custom domain URL (if configured) per `frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOY_CHECKLIST.md`.
A complete deployment log is captured using `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LOG_CAPTURE_TEMPLATE.md` (date/time, operator, commit hash, DFX version, and full command output).

file_operations.description: Expand the template to capture all required deployment metadata (date/time, operator, branch, commit hash, DFX version) and include dedicated sections to paste full command output for `dfx build ... --network ic` and `dfx deploy ... --network ic`, plus a checklist-style area to record verification results for both the ic0.app canister URL and the custom domain URL (if configured).

Tighten the checklist wording to ensure it explicitly instructs the operator to (a) run the IC mainnet build/deploy commands, (b) capture full stdout/stderr into `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LOG_CAPTURE_TEMPLATE.md`, and (c) record pass/fail results for both the direct canister URL and the custom domain URL checks.

requirements.summary: Complete and expand low-cost domain setup walkthrough for connecting a purchased domain to the deployed frontend canister (DNS + IC custom domain mapping).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP_GUIDE.md` is updated so it does not end mid-step and includes: how to retrieve the frontend canister ID (e.g., `dfx canister id frontend --network ic`), the required DNS records with example values, and the high-level IC custom domain mapping steps.
The guide explicitly covers price-conscious registrar options already listed (Namecheap, Porkbun, Cloudflare, etc.) and includes a short checklist emphasizing renewal price and WHOIS privacy.
All user-facing documentation text is written in English.

file_operations.description: Finish the incomplete guide (currently ends after 'Step 3') and expand it to include: how to retrieve the production frontend canister ID (`dfx canister id frontend --network ic`) and where else to find it; concrete DNS record examples (hostnames, example values, and notes on apex vs subdomain); and a high-level walkthrough of IC custom domain mapping steps (what needs to be configured and where). Also add a short price-conscious checklist emphasizing renewal price and WHOIS privacy, while retaining and expanding the existing registrar options section. Ensure the entire doc is in English.

requirements.summary: Complete the production go-live runbook so it is actionable end-to-end with environment validation, deploy commands, and post-deploy verification (ic0.app + clearing.icp0.io).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/PRODUCTION_GO_LIVE_RUNBOOK.md` includes the missing sections after “Environment Check”, with step-by-step commands aligned with `frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOY_CHECKLIST.md`.
Runbook includes explicit verification steps for: access-code gate (code: `1122`), booking CTA, footer visibility, and no invisible clickable areas at page bottom.
Runbook includes a short troubleshooting pointer that references the existing checklist troubleshooting section and `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTE_clearing-icp0-io.md`.

file_operations.description: Add the missing runbook sections after 'Environment Check' to make the procedure end-to-end: environment validation steps, the exact IC mainnet build/deploy commands (aligned with `frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOY_CHECKLIST.md`), and post-deploy verification for both ic0.app and `https://clearing.icp0.io`. Include explicit checks for access-code gate (code `1122`), booking CTA behavior, footer visibility, and confirmation there are no invisible clickable areas at the page bottom. Add a short troubleshooting pointer that references the troubleshooting section in `frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOY_CHECKLIST.md` and the note `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTE_clearing-icp0-io.md`.
